Question: Which of the following accolades are associated with the movie 'Chhichhore' released in 2019?
Options:
A. Best Feature Film in Hindi at National Film Awards
B. Best Director at the Filmfare Awards
C. Best Actor at the National Film Awards
D. Best Screenplay at the IIFA Awards
Answer: Best Feature Film in Hindi at National Film Awards

Question: Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Chhichhore' receive in 2019 related to Nitesh Tiwari?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Film (Critics) at Screen Awards
B. Won Best Director at Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Film at IIFA Awards
D. Nominated for Best Film (Critics) at Screen Awards
Answer: Nominated for Best Film (Critics) at Screen Awards

Question: Which of the following accolades did Varun Sharma receive for his performance in 'Chhichhore' (2019)?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Supporting Actor at Screen Awards
B. Won Best Actor at Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Supporting Actor at Screen Awards in 2019
D. Won Best Supporting Actor at National Film Awards
Answer: Nominated for Best Supporting Actor at Screen Awards, Nominated for Best Supporting Actor at Screen Awards in 2019

Question: Which accolades were associated with the movie 'Chhichhore' released in 2019?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Director at the Zee Cine Awards in 2020
B. Won Best Actor at the Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Film at the Zee Cine Awards in 2020
D. Won Best Supporting Actor at the IIFA Awards
Answer: Nominated for Best Director at the Zee Cine Awards in 2020, Nominated for Best Film at the Zee Cine Awards in 2020

Question: Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Chhichhore' (2019) receive related to its music?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Background Score at Mirchi Music Awards in 2020
B. Won Best Original Score at Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Soundtrack at IIFA Awards
D. Nominated for Best Background Score at Mirchi Music Awards
Answer: Nominated for Best Background Score at Mirchi Music Awards in 2020, Nominated for Best Background Score at Mirchi Music Awards
